abstract: Japanese Foreign Ministry says China has detained two Japanese nationals since May 2015 on suspicion of spying; issue could hamper push to repair relations between two countries.
lead_paragraph: Asked if Japan had sent spies to China, a government spokesman said, “As a nation, we absolutely do not do that. I want to say the same thing to all countries.”

headline.main: Japan: China Detains 2 Japanese on Suspicion of Espionage
headline.print_headline: Asia; Japan: 2 Japanese Citizens Held in China on Suspicion of Espionage

snippet: Asked if Japan had sent spies to China, a government spokesman said, “As a nation, we absolutely do not do that. I want to say the same thing to all countries.”
